name: ONYX BOOX Tab Ultra C Pro
description: 10.3-inch color e-ink tablet with Kaleido 3 display. Features Android apps, note-taking with stylus, and eye-friendly reading experience. Perfect for documents and reading.

reviews.review_text: Color e-ink is finally good. Great for reading.
Perfect for PDF documents. No eye strain.
Refresh rate limits video but that is expected.
